mapper.sql: data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date
mapper.insert: insert into data_interface2proc (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date) values (#{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into data_interface2proc
data_src_abbr,
data_interface_no,
proc_database_name,
proc_name,
s_date,
e_date,
#{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{procDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{eDate,jdbcType=DATE},

insert into data_interface2proc (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date) SELECT data_interface2proc_tmp.data_src_abbr, data_interface2proc_tmp.data_interface_no, data_interface2proc_tmp.proc_database_name, data_interface2proc_tmp.proc_name, data_interface2proc_tmp.s_date, data_interface2proc_tmp.e_date FROM data_interface2proc_tmp where 1=1 and data_interface2proc_tmp.data_src_abbr=#{dataSrcAbbr} and data_interface2proc_tmp.data_interface_no=#{dataInterfaceNo} and data_interface2proc_tmp.batch_no=#{batchNo}

insert into data_interface2proc_tmp (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date,batch_no) values
(#{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{model.eDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{model.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into data_interface2proc (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date) values
(#{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{model.eDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into data_interface2proc_history (need_vrsn_nbr,expt_seq_nbr,data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, proc_database_name, proc_name, s_date, e_date) values
((#{model.needVrsnNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{model.exptSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{model.eDate,jdbcType=DATE})
